4260542944: Content scraping (inozivikanwawo se "screen scraping" kana kungo "scraping") inzira yakajairika, inowanzobatsira yekuunganidza ruzivo kubva pawebhu. Nekudaro, mumakore achangopfuura, nzira iyi yave chishandiso chinofarirwa nevanobira uye vanobira. Countermeasures inogona kudzikamisa kutyisidzira, asi kuti uzviite, zvakakosha kuti unzwisise kuti maitiro acho anoshanda sei.
1910628828: Content scraping inzira yekutora data kubva kune system inosanganisira automated toolset inotevedzera software client kana web browser. Hazvisi zvitsva. Muchokwadi, kune vanjiniya vesoftware vangangoda data kubva kune yekare mainframe, scraping inogona kunge iri nzira chete yekuburitsa ruzivo. Iwo ekutanga anobatanidza anogona kunge aenda uye haagone kutsiva.
3408107995: Nhasi, zvakadaro, kukwenya nguva dzose kunoreva nzira yakarongwa yekudhonza data kubva pawebhusaiti. Iyo scraping software inoita semushandisi wemunhu, kudzvanya mabhatani uye kuverenga zvinobuda. Pane zvakawanda zviri pamutemo kushandiswa kukorobha. Web crawlers kuti simba rekutsvaga injini imwe muenzaniso. Ndizvo zvakaita maturusi akaita seSkyscanner anotsvaga madhiri ekufambisa nekubatanidza zviuru zvemawebhusaiti ekufambisa. Mafemu eFintech anoishandisa, zvakare, kukwenya data remushandisi kubva kumabhangi masaiti kana pasina Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) iripo kuita data data. Zvinhu zvekuchengeta mupfungwa nezve screen scraping ndiko kumhanya kwayo uye scalability. Maitiro acho anogona kukohwa yakakura kwazvo data kubva kumawebhusaiti, achifungidzira kuti masaiti haana kugadzirwa kuti arege kuitika. Pakumhanya kwekombuta, scraper inogona kuunganidza datasets hombe nekudyidzana nemawebhusaiti uye iri pasi pesoftware uye dhatabhesi inovapa simba.
2256795853: Iko kukwanisa kubvisa data yakawanda, nekukurumidza, kubva kune mawebhusaiti kunoita kuti kukwenya chishandiso chine simba mumaoko evaiti vane hutsinye. A scraping bot inogona kuunganidza data yevashandisi kubva pasocial media. Zvino, nekukwenya masaiti ane kero uye rumwe ruzivo rwemunhu uye kubatanidza zvabuda, mubiki anogona kuita mhosva dzekuzivikanwa sekutumira zvikumbiro zvekadhi rechikwereti zvehutsotsi.
4087694419: A scraping hacker anogonawo kuunganidza data kubva kumasayiti akaita seAmazon neBay kugadzira zvinyorwa zvenhema kana zvinonyengera. Imwezve skrini yekurasa hutsotsi hunosanganisira kunyepedzera vabudisi vezviziviso. Nekukwenya zvirimo kubva kumasayiti evaparidzi, munyengeri anogona kugadzira enhema ad muparidzi mapeji pamasevhisi akasiyana. Vanogona kuzotengesa zviziviso pamapeji iwayo kune vatengesi vane mvumo, vane mazita avakakohwa kubva kumuparidzi's ads.txt faira. Iwo ad slots anoita seachokwadi kumushambadziri, asi hazvisizvo.

3660891610: Kana iwe uri Mupi, IMI, uye kwete iwe, ine kodzero dzevaridzi mune chero basa raunoburitsa sechikamu chekupedzisa chero basa. Nekugamuchira zvibvumirano zveChibvumirano ichi unobvuma (uye woita) kuendesa zvinhu, muridzi, uye zita (kusanganisira kodzero dzese dzepfuma dziripo pasi rose) mukati uye kubasa rako kwatiri. Kuti tive nechokwadi chekuti tinokwanisa kuwana, kukwana, uye kushandisa kodzero dzakadaro, unobvumirana zvakare (i) kusaina chero magwaro ekubatsira mukunyorwa, kukwana uye kuchengetedzwa kwekodzero dzedu; uye (ii) kupa ruzivo rwakakwana rwekurekodha, kururamisa, kuchengetedza, kudzivirira, uye kusimbisa kodzero dzevaridzi dzakadaro mune chero uye nyika dzese. 477275453: Sei ma API ari Akakurumbira Target Kune Hackers?
596347471: Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) yave chinangwa chakakurumbira chevaiti vane hutsinye mucyberspace. Pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zveizvi, kusanganisira yavo huru yekushandisa mukubatanidza application. Izvo zvinokwanisika kuderedza API njodzi, zvisinei.
3963216198: Kuti tikurukure kuti sei maAPI ari akakurumbira chinangwa chevabiki, zvakakosha kutanga watora kanguva pfupi kutsanangura zvinorehwa neizwi rekuti "API." Pfungwa yeAPI haisi itsva zvachose. Muchokwadi, maficha ekubatanidza akasiyana makomputa masisitimu nemumwe, pamwe nezvikamu zvawo zvemukati, anga aripo kubva angangoita ma1960 ekutanga.
1047251718: Nhasi, zvisinei, kana vanhu vachitaura nezve APIs, ivo vanogara vachireva zviyero-based APIs. Aya maAPI akavakwa pachishandiswa akavhurika zviyero seRepresentational State Transfer (REST) uye akavhura akajairwa faira mafomati seJavaScript Object Notation (JSON). Ma "RESTful API" akadaro, sekuzivikanwa kwavanoita, anogona kugadzirwa pasina kudiwa kwesoftware. Iwo anokonzeresa APIs anokwanisa kutumira uye kugamuchira data uye maitiro mafoni pakati pesoftware application. Semuenzaniso, mobile banking app inoshandisa API kuwana masisitimu ebhangi.
3195334319: Iko kushandiswa uye kusagadzikana kwe APIs
1903743785: Kuuya kwezviyero-based APIs kwakamiririra kusvetuka kukuru mukubatanidza kwekushandisa. Kwemakore makumi maviri apfuura kana zvakadaro, ma APIs akabva pakudhura uye kuomesesa zvigadzirwa zvesoftware kuenda kune zvemahara, zviyero-zvakavakirwa maturusi izvo zvaive nyore kushanda nazvo-uye nekukurumidza kutumira.
879362350: Nema API matsva anoshanda paInternet, zvakave zvinogoneka kubatanidza chero software kana data sosi, chero kupi munyika, zvisinei nepuratifomu, data schema kana mutauro wechirongwa. Nekuda kweizvozvo, iyo komputa nyika yave pakati peiyo API shanduko. Pave nekuputika kwekubatana pakati pemaapplication nedata. Zvakanaka, kusvikira zvisingaite.
3844432472: Iko kuvhurika chaiko uye kushandiswa kwema APIs kunoita kuti vapfume zvakanyanya zvinangwa zvevanorwisa. Nenzira imwecheteyo iyo nharembozha inogona kurongwa kuti isvike uye GET data kubva kune yekambani system uchishandisa API, saizvozvowo chidimbu chemalware. Hackers vakanyora zvakasiyana-siyana zvekushandisa software kushungurudza APIs. Iyo inobudirira kurwisa nzira.
2187096543: Chokwadi, pakave nekutyorwa kukuru kwedata kunobva kune hacker-yakanyorwa software yakadana API kuti ibvise data kubva mudhatabhesi. Mushure mezvose, kana ichiba data ichingoda kufona kweGET pane API, yakanyorwa uchishandisa REST neJSON, saka zviri nyore kukurumidza kubvisa dhatabhesi rakachena. Muchokwadi, kana vanhu vachitaura nezve "screen scraping" kurwiswa, zvavanoreva chaizvo, kunyanya, inokurumidza-moto API inofona inodhonza data kubva mudhatabhesi. APIs dzave nzvimbo huru yekurwisa kumasangano anoavaka.
